commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas4f65e2e"

diff:
"4f65e2e Bug 395407 - Symbol upload and unpack can conflict if builds have the same buildid. Actually make the previously approved patch work. r=luser.
diff --git a/Makefile.in b/Makefile.in
index 8a166b1..603cbb8 100644
--- a/Makefile.in
+++ b/Makefile.in
@@ -163,7 +163,7 @@ ifdef MOZ_SYMBOLS_EXTRA_BUILDID
 EXTRA_BUILDID := -$(MOZ_SYMBOLS_EXTRA_BUILDID)
 endif
 
-SYMBOL_ARCHIVE_BASENAME := \
+SYMBOL_ARCHIVE_BASENAME = \
   $(MOZ_APP_NAME)-$(MOZ_APP_VERSION)-$(OS_ARCH)-$(BUILDID)$(EXTRA_BUILDID)
 
 buildsymbols:
"
